caseStudies.title: Canine Diabetes Management
caseStudies.description: A 7-year-old Labrador retriever was diagnosed with diabetes. Treatment involved insulin therapy and a strict diet plan.

caseStudies.title: Feline Kidney Disease
caseStudies.description: A 10-year-old cat with kidney disease was stabilized using IV fluids, specialized diets, and medication.

caseStudies.title: Parrot Feather Plucking
caseStudies.description: A macaw presented with feather plucking due to stress. The treatment plan included enrichment and dietary changes.

caseStudies.title: Iguana Metabolic Bone Disease
caseStudies.description: An iguana was treated for calcium deficiency with supplements and UVB exposure.

caseStudies.title: Equine Colic Surgery
caseStudies.description: A horse underwent emergency surgery for colic and made a full recovery.

caseStudies.title: Dairy Cow Mastitis
caseStudies.description: A dairy cow with mastitis was treated with antibiotics and improved within a week.
